See also: treppe

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Middle High German

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [ˈtʁɛpə]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Treppe f (genitive Treppe, plural Treppen)

  1. stairs
